subtitle.add: Legend tells of a legendary warrior
Whose kung fu skill were the stuff of legend
He traveled the land
in search of worthy foes
I see you like to chew
maybe you should chew on my fist
the warrior said nothing for his mouse was full
then he swallowed and then he spoke
enough talk, let's fight
